scripts.serve: ls && cd ./client && npm run serve && cd ..
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.deploy-cloud-run: gcloud run deploy call-to-action --image us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/$CALL_TO_ACTION_ID/api/test-image --region us-central1 --platform managed
scripts.deploy-client: echo 'Deploying client...' && cd client && npm run build && cd .. && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy-server: echo 'Deploying server...' && npm run docker-build && npm run deploy-cloud-run
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-client && npm run deploy-server
scripts.deploy-server-local: docker build -t local/test-image . && docker run -p 8080:8080 -e PORT=8080 local/test-image
